SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.util.group

Interface Grid.Index

All Superinterfaces:
Transformable<Integer>
Enclosing interface:
Grid<E>
public static interface Grid.Index extends Transformable<Integer>
An index which can be used to traverse through a grid. Grids will accept any instance of this interface as input for an index.
See Also:
  • Grid.indexOf(int, int)
  • GridIndex
